application.doc: Updating an existing rate limiting policy

param.name: file_id
param.doc: The name of the rate limiting policy to update.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Updating an existing rate limiting policy
method.doc: To edit an existing rate limiting policy with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the rate limiting policy resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The rate limiting policy as application or octet-stream.

param.name: content
param.doc: The content of the new rate limiting policy as plain text.

response.doc:
200 ok
Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
